The reward chest can be found in the lobby of The Gauntlet. After attempting The Gauntlet, players can find rewards for their efforts done.

Contents

    • 1.1 Minimal Damage
    • 1.2 Boss Partially Damaged

    • 1.4 Corrupted Gauntlet Completed

Loot table[edit | edit source]

Upon completing the challenge, players will receive 2 rolls on regular loot table, as well as several crystal shards.

Upon completion of the Corrupted challenge, players will receive an extra roll on the loot table.

Upon failing the challenge, players might still get rewarded with some lower value loot.

Minimal Damage[edit | edit source]

One of these three items is awarded if the player dies dealing minimal damage to the boss.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Flyer1CommonNot soldN/A
Potion1CommonNot sold0
Rotten tomato1CommonNot sold0

Boss Partially Damaged[edit | edit source]

One of these items is awarded if the player dies while trying to kill the boss or leaves the boss room early. An average roll on this table is worth 1,971.

Drop rates estimated based on 1,839 partial Gauntlet completions from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The Gauntlet Completed[edit | edit source]

The player receives crystal shards and two rolls from the standard table. An average boss kill is worth 77,094 excluding crystal shards, uniques, and clue scrolls. Including crystal shards and uniques, a kill is worth somewhere in the realm of 292,050.

Drop rates estimated based on 1,480 Gauntlet completions from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

100% Drop[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Crystal shard3–7AlwaysNot soldN/A

Corrupted Gauntlet Completed[edit | edit source]

The player receives crystal shards and three rolls from the standard table. An average boss kill is worth 174,071 excluding crystal shards, uniques, and clue scrolls. Including crystal shards and uniques, a kill is worth somewhere in the realm of 807,464.

Drop rates estimated based on 7,535 Corrupted Gauntlet completions from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

100% Drop[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Crystal shard5–9AlwaysNot soldN/A
Gauntlet cape1Always[a 1]Not soldN/A
  1. ^ Awarded if the player does not already have a Gauntlet cape
